etymology.description: 艮(艮) (gèn, "stopping") + 而(而) (ér, "and") = combining stopping with a phonetic element -> soft
etymology.interpretation: 𦘒 is a phono-semantic compound where the stopping action of 艮(艮) (gèn, "stopping") combines with the phonetic element of 而(而) (ér, "and"). The character represents the concept of softness, likely drawing on the phonetic component for its pronunciation.
